parameters.name: DBClusterIds
parameters.description: The cluster ID. Separate multiple clusters with commas (,).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   30
*   50
*   100

Default value: 30.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the cluster.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
